name: Twitch E-Z See Chat and more
description:
TO CUSTOMIZE THIS STYLE, CLICK ADVANCED STYLE SETTINGS

This userstyle enlarges the Twitch chat box affording you more viewable lines of text, as well as allowing you the option to adjust the font size larger for easier reading.
additional_info:

In addition, there are options to adjust the font size for chat, directory listings, and search results.
